rules_text:
Inscribe [i]( Your enchantments can help cast this spell. Each enchantment you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1} or one mana of that enchantment's colors.)[/i]
Target creature you control gets +1/+1 for each artifact and enchantment you control until end of turn.
rules_text2:
Misty Essence Pool enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Misty Essence Pool: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
